content.text:
# Muhammad Ghulam Sarwar

Muhammad Ghulam Sarwar is a Pakistani politician who has been a Member of the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab since 2024.
Political career
He was elected to the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab as a Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf-backed independent candidate from constituency PP-204 Sahiwal-VII in the 2024 Pakistani general election.
